DESeqAnalysis 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Markdown

Source: R/markdown-methods.R
markdown.Rd

Markdown

# S4 method for DESeqAnalysis
markdown(object)

# S4 method for DESeqResultsTables
markdown(object, headerLevel = 2L)

Arguments

object

Object.
headerLevel

scalar integer (1-7). Markdown header level.

Value

Markdown output.

Methods (by class)

  • DESeqAnalysis: List of contrast names.

  • DESeqResultsTables: File paths (if exported) and top tables.

Examples

data(deseq)

# DESeqAnalysis ====
markdown(deseq)
#> [1] "## Contrast names\n"
#> attr(,"format")
#> [1] "markdown"
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "knit_asis"
#> attr(,"knit_cacheable")
#> [1] NA
#> [1] "- treatment folic acid vs control\n"
#> attr(,"format")
#> [1] "markdown"
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "knit_asis"
#> attr(,"knit_cacheable")
#> [1] NA

## DESeqResultsTables ====
x <- DESeqResultsTables(deseq)
#> DESeqResults: treatment folic acid vs control (shrunken LFC)
markdown(x)
#> 
#> 
#> ## treatment folic acid vs control
#> 
#> Object doesn't contain saved file paths.
#> 
#> 
#> ### Top tables
#> 
#>
